project_descr: Capacity for implementing Rio+ Conventions in Samoa (PPG)

outputs.output_descr:
PPG Activities and Justifications:  The PPG consists of two components. The first will undertake the detailed background analysis and prepare the detailed technical strategies for each component of the project. The second component will use outputs from the first component to prepare detailed project design and GEF submission documents. Stakeholder validation, completing the financial package, and securing partnerships will be part of this second component.

COMPONENT 1 - Background analysis

This will build on the significant information available from the NCSA process.

1.1 Develop pro
